## Problem 1

```{r}
pols_month =
  read_csv("data/fivethirtyeight/pols-month.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day")) |> 
  mutate(
    month = 
      case_match(
        month,
        "01" ~ "January",
        "02" ~ "February",
        "03" ~ "March",
        "04" ~ "April",
        "05" ~ "May",
        "06" ~ "June",
        "07" ~ "July",
        "08" ~ "August",
        "09" ~ "September",
        "10" ~ "October",
        "11" ~ "November",
        "12" ~ "December"
      )
  ) |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(prez_gop, prez_dem),
    names_to = "president",
    values_to = "party"
  ) |> 
  select(-day)

```
